title: Vanilla vs. Modded: The Future of Hytale Survival
excerpt: Will vanilla Hytale servers survive the age of total conversion mods? We explore why the core survival experience remains the heart of the Hytale community.
content:
Modding is a pillar of Hytale, but for many, the raw vanilla experience is why they fell in love with sandbox games. There is a specific kind of magic in working within the developers' constraints.

The Appeal of Vanilla

Vanilla servers offer a level playing field and a predictable set of rules that allow player skill and community interaction to shine.
